mAP_score_explanation: mAP is the average precision across all classes, based on specific IoU thresholds.

mAP@50.description: Measures performance when a detection is considered True Positive if IoU >= 50%. (Less strict localization).

mAP@50-95.description: The standard metric for accurate localization. It averages the mAP across 10 IoU thresholds (0.5, 0.55, 0.6, ..., 0.95).
